short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME and to supply and delivery of solid oak interior flag poles complete with brass couplers.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 28, 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada requires the supply and delivery of solid oak interior flag poles complete with brass couplers.
